answers.answer: Eliminate salt. Whenever u sit down, try elevating your feet. If u experience pain while walking or they turn bright red tell a Dr BC it could mean u have a blood clot. And also let us Dr know if u have headaches or dizziness as well as swelling. That could be a sign of preeclampsia.
Thank you and yes I eat salty foods... Not as much anymore...
Always happened to me, especially my tattoo on my leg ): just drink more water and cut out salty foods
You could try strapping your ankles at night, or get compression socks. I strap mine when they swell and by the morning, they are normal size.

question: I and 28 weeks and my ankles hurt so bad... Also they won't stop swelling... What should I do?
title: Swelling...
